SEARCH
Package com.APP.Project.UserCoreLogic.game_entities.orders

Class BombOrderTest

java.lang.Object
com.APP.Project.UserCoreLogic.game_entities.orders.BombOrderTest
public class BombOrderTest extends Object
This class represents the test cases for the BombOrder class, which is responsible for executing bomb orders in the game. It includes tests for various scenarios such as bombing an opponent's country, handling the absence of bomb cards, ensuring correct removal of cards, and negotiating with other players.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Rikin Dipakkumar Chauhan
